Articles.Content: Damn you're just having a really bad month, man. Get better!

Guess I never made a public announcement. I'll be helping Mike run an Eyes Turned Skywards mod. I don't claim any credit for any management skills or something like that. Just running the page and maybe doing some testing. Expect a thread soon, maybe when we have something deliverable!

Can we see a pic of the TKS? As one of my favourite real-life vehicles, I'm eager to see it.

With this pack, I suggested a release plan to Mike that basically entails releasing the various blocks of the Apollo spacecraft and the Saturn IB and V first, then finishing off the Apollo family with the AARDV and Saturn Multibody. But we shall see how we actually release things later on down the line.
Okay, right off the bat, when pitching up at high speeds, the craft looses lift and falls down, with no recovery. I think a good fix would just be a larger lift rating for the craft.

here is the shuttle TDRS .craft file, as promised: https://www.dropbox.com/s/6sghw7a4o2m065j/Space%20Shuttle-tdrs.craft?dl=0

note for mike: check things over before putting it anywhere official, i did not bother with checking the staging, merely assembling the IUS and TDRS (i think i forgot a part, the IUS wouldn't decouple from the IUS cradle thingie).
Update: When you pull up, the craft slows dramatically, from 110m/s to 41m/s within a second.

Update: When you pull up, the craft slows dramatically, from 110m/s to 41m/s within a second.

ok it will have to wait, I have bigger things to work on atm. if you want to modify the cfg for a better value I will be happy to change it later
